subject: Judo
Martial Arts
Japanese-Americans
lead_paragraph: Coach Yoshihiro Uchida, 92, built the San Jose State judo program into a national power and has almost single-handedly elevated the stature and visibility of the sport in the United States.
snippet: Coach Yoshihiro Uchida, 92, built the San Jose State judo program into a national power and has almost single-handedly elevated the stature and visibility of the sport in the United States.
